00084 static unsigned int pvNavUsed = 0;
00085 
00087 #ifdef FREERTOS_USED
00088 static xSemaphoreHandle xFs_Access;
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 
00104 int open(const char *pathname, int flags, ...)
00105 {
00106 int CurrentNavId = -1;
00107 
00108 
00109   // take the mutex for nav access
00110   fsaccess_take_mutex();
00111 
00112   // if no navigator available, return an error
00113   if ((CurrentNavId = fsaccess_alloc_nav_id()) < 0) goto error_exit;
00114 
00115   // select the navigator
00116   nav_select( CurrentNavId );
00117   
00118   // select dataflash
00119   nav_drive_set( LUN_ID_AT45DBX_MEM );
00120 
00121   // mount file system
00122   if(nav_partition_mount() == FALSE) goto error_free_nav;
00123 
00124   // the filesystem is now at the root directory
00125   if ((flags & O_CREAT) == O_CREAT)
00126   {
00127     // try to create, the flag is set
00128     if(nav_setcwd((FS_STRING)pathname, FALSE, TRUE) == FALSE)
00129     {
00130        goto error_free_nav;
00131     }
00132   }
00133   else
00134   {
00135     // do not try to create, if it doesn't exist, error
00136     if(nav_setcwd((FS_STRING)pathname, FALSE, FALSE) == FALSE)
00137     {
00138        goto error_free_nav;
00139     }   
00140   }
00141 
00142   // if user wants to append in file
00143   if ((flags & O_APPEND) == O_APPEND)
00144   {
00145     // open the file
00146     if (file_open(FOPEN_MODE_APPEND) == FALSE) goto error_free_nav;
00147   }
00148   else if ((flags & O_RDWR) == O_RDWR)
00149   {
00150     // open as read/write
00151     if (file_open(FOPEN_MODE_R_PLUS) == FALSE) goto error_free_nav;
00152   }
00153   else if ((flags & O_WRONLY) == O_WRONLY)
00154   {
00155     // open as write
00156     if (file_open(FOPEN_MODE_W) == FALSE) goto error_free_nav;
00157   }
00158   else
00159   {
00160     // open as read
00161     if (file_open(FOPEN_MODE_R) == FALSE) goto error_free_nav;
00162   }
00163 
00164   // give the mutex for nav access
00165   fsaccess_give_mutex();
00166 
00167   return (CurrentNavId);
00168 
00169 error_free_nav:
00170   // mark NavId as free
00171   fsaccess_free_nav_id(CurrentNavId);
00172 error_exit:
00173   // give the mutex for nav access
00174   fsaccess_give_mutex();
00175   return(-1);    
00176 }
00177 
00185 size_t fsaccess_file_get_size(int fd)
00186 {
00187 size_t size;
00188 
00189   if (fd < 0)
00190   {
00191     return (0);
00192   }
00193   // take the mutex for nav access
00194   fsaccess_take_mutex();
00195   // select the navigator
00196   nav_select( fd );
00197   // get the file size
00198   size = nav_file_lgt();
00199   // give the mutex for nav access
00200   fsaccess_give_mutex();
00201   return (size);
00202 }
00203 
00213 ssize_t read(int fd, void *buf, size_t count)
00214 {
00215 ssize_t ReadCount = -1;
00216 
00217   if (fd < 0)
00218   {
00219     return (-1);
00220   }
00221   // take the mutex for nav access
00222   fsaccess_take_mutex();
00223 
00224   nav_select( fd );
00225 
00226   if ( file_eof() )
00227   {
00228      // give the mutex for nav access
00229      fsaccess_give_mutex();
00230      return(-1);        
00231   }
00232 
00233   ReadCount = (ssize_t)file_read_buf((U8 *)buf , (U16)count);
00234 
00235   // give the mutex for nav access
00236   fsaccess_give_mutex();
00237   return(ReadCount);
00238 }
00239 
00240 
00250 ssize_t write(int fd, const void *buf, size_t count)
00251 {
00252 ssize_t WriteCount = -1;
00253 
00254   if (fd < 0)
00255   {
00256     return (-1);
00257   }
00258   // take the mutex for nav access
00259   fsaccess_take_mutex();
00260 
00261   nav_select( fd );
00262   
00263   WriteCount = (ssize_t)file_write_buf((U8 *)buf , (U16)count);
00264 
00265   // give the mutex for nav access
00266   fsaccess_give_mutex();
00267   return(WriteCount);
00268 }
00269 
00277 int close(int fd)
00278 {
00279   if (fd < 0)
00280   {
00281     return (-1);
00282   }
00283   // take the mutex for nav access
00284   fsaccess_take_mutex();
00285 
00286   nav_select( fd );
00287  
00288   file_close();
00289   
00290 
00291   fsaccess_free_nav_id(fd);
00292 
00293   // give the mutex for nav access
00294   fsaccess_give_mutex();
00295 
00296   return (0);
00297 }
00298 
00304 long fsaccess_alloc_nav_id( void )
00305 {
00306 unsigned int j;
00307   // get a free nav id
00308   // NOTE: we start at FS_NB_RESERVED_NAV, because 2 is usually used as
00309   // the navigator for file copy. 0 & 1 may be used independently of the fsaccess module.
00310   for (j = FS_NB_RESERVED_NAV ; j < FS_NB_NAVIGATOR ; j++)
00311   {
00312     if (!Tst_bits(pvNavUsed, (1 << j)))
00313     {
00314       Set_bits(pvNavUsed, (1 << j));
00315       return (j);
00316     }
00317   }
00318   // no nav free for now
00319   return(-1);
00320 }
00321 
00322 
00328 void fsaccess_free_nav_id(int fd)
00329 {
00330   // mark NavId as free
00331   Clr_bits(pvNavUsed, (1 << fd));
00332 }
00333 
00337 Bool b_fsaccess_init(void)
00338 {
00339   nav_reset();
00340 #ifdef FREERTOS_USED
00341   if (xFs_Access == NULL)
00342   {
00343     vSemaphoreCreateBinary( xFs_Access );
00344     if( xFs_Access == NULL )
00345       return( FALSE );
00346     else
00347       return( TRUE );
00348   }
00349 #endif
00350   return( TRUE );
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00357 void fsaccess_take_mutex(void)
00358 {
00359 #ifdef FREERTOS_USED
00360   // wait for semaphore
00361   while( xSemaphoreTake( xFs_Access, (portTickType)-1 ) != pdTRUE );
00362 #endif
00363 }
00364 
00368 void fsaccess_give_mutex(void)
00369 {
00370 #ifdef FREERTOS_USED
00371   // Release the mutex.
00372   xSemaphoreGive( xFs_Access );
00373 #endif
00374 }
00375 
00376 
00384 S8 fsaccess_IsDirPresent( const char *pcStringDirName )
00385 {
00386    signed short TempoNavId;
00387    S8           RetVal;
00388 
00389 
00390    fsaccess_take_mutex(); // Take the mutex on the file system access.
00391 
00392    TempoNavId = fsaccess_alloc_nav_id(); // Get a navigator.
00393    if( -1 == TempoNavId ) // No navigator.
00394    {
00395       // give the mutex for nav access
00396       fsaccess_give_mutex();
00397       return( -1 );
00398    }
00399 
00400    // select the navigator
00401    nav_select( TempoNavId );
00402 
00403    // select dataflash
00404    nav_drive_set( LUN_ID_AT45DBX_MEM );
00405 
00406    // mount file system
00407    if(nav_partition_mount() == FALSE)
00408    {
00409       // mark NavId as free
00410       fsaccess_free_nav_id( TempoNavId );
00411       // give the mutex for nav access
00412       fsaccess_give_mutex();
00413       return( -1 );
00414    }
00415 
00416    // Try to enter in the directory.
00417    RetVal = (S8)nav_setcwd( (FS_STRING)pcStringDirName, TRUE, FALSE );
00418 
00419    fsaccess_free_nav_id( TempoNavId ); // mark NavId as free
00420    fsaccess_give_mutex(); // give the mutex for nav access
00421 
00422    return( RetVal );
00423 }
